title: Vuelta stage 18 preview: Can Kuss hang on? One final mountain-top finish to seal or unseat race leader
content:
Can Sepp Kuss defend on one more mountain-top finish after being dropped by his teammates two days in a row?

Read the full article at Vuelta stage 18 preview: Can Kuss hang on? One final mountain-top finish to seal or unseat race leader on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
